sentences.en: John was making more money, but I continued to scrimp and save.
sentences.cn: 约翰挣钱比以前多了, 可是我继续节省开支攒钱.

sentences.en: Scrimping on safety measures can be a false economy.
sentences.cn: 在安全措施方面节省开支可能会得不偿失。

sentences.en: She had to scrimp and save to pay for her holiday.
sentences.cn: 她必须节省开支以支付度假的费用.

sentences.en: They had to scrimp and save to send their son to college.
sentences.cn: 为了送儿子上大学,他们不得不省吃俭用,拼命攒钱.

sentences.en: We had to scrimp and save to pay the bills.
sentences.cn: 我们得省吃俭用来付帐.

sentences.en: We shall scrimp and save , grandchildren on your knee, Vera Chuck & amp; Dave.
sentences.cn: 我们过着简朴的生活, 孙子们在你的膝盖上,分别叫做维拉 、 恰克 和 大卫.

trans.tran_en: If you scrimp on things, you live cheaply and spend as little money as possible

trans.tran_cn: （较平时）节省着过日子，一点一滴地省钱，吝啬，克扣
